summary: Implements a full Efficient‑UNet architecture equipped with multi‑head attention, timestep embeddings and optional text conditioning, tailored for high‑resolution image super‑resolution in the Imagen diffusion framework.
business_intent: Delivers a high‑performance neural network component for AI‑driven image upscaling and generation conditioned on textual prompts, supporting commercial use cases such as content creation, visual effects, and image enhancement services.
